title: 新人MCP求助。
author: 匿名
txt_content:
打开MCP的forge里的gradlew.bat结果只出现
The assetDir is deprecated!  Use runDir instead! runDir set to eclipse/assets/..The assetDir is deprecated!  Use runDir instead! runDir set to eclipse/assets/..

****************************
 Powered By MCP:             
http://mcp.ocean-labs.de/   
 Searge, ProfMobius, Fesh0r, 
 R4wk, ZeuX, IngisKahn, bspkrs
 MCP Data version : unknown
****************************
:help

Welcome to Gradle 1.12.

To run a build, run gradlew <task> ...

To see a list of available tasks, run gradlew tasks

To see a list of command-line options, run gradlew --help

BUILD SUCCESSFUL

Total time: 12.937 secs

就完了，怎么回事啊，求助！

replies.author: 陈翰磊
replies.txt_content: MCP是节操君发明出来的吗...

replies.author: 鱼青余
replies.txt_content: 也许你应该在问答版去发

replies.author: nggcgg2
replies.txt_content:
